title: Katie Lo x Club Ride Artist Collection casual style benefits World Ride
content:
Are you into rad collab gear that supports local artists and women cyclists at the same time? If it sounds too good to be true, it might well have been before a casual-cool bike apparel company teamed up with a Jackson, Wyoming artist to create a new gear line. Club Ride collab benefits women cyclists

The post Katie Lo x Club Ride Artist Collection casual style benefits World Ride appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
